body:
As I recall, all 3D geometry had to be converted to 3dfaces and we used
to do this by 3ds export. Is this still the procedure? Or...?

--
Randolph Fritz
design machine group, architecture department, university of washington
rfritz@u.washington.edu -or- rfritz333@gmail.com
subject: [Radiance-general] Preparing an open DXF file for import
